start.text: D'oh! What are you doing here?

explore.text: Well, don't eat my donuts! Or drink my beer!

not_much.text: Just thinking about donuts... mmm, donuts.

donut.text: Okay, but only one! And you owe me a beer later.

look_around.text: Fine, but remember, Springfield is a dangerous place!

start.text: Oh my... you look just like Chad Sexington, the Burly paper towel man. So strong, so rugged...

flirt.text: Yes, you do... Maybe you could help me with something... like reaching the top shelf, or... something more personal?

options.response: What did you have in mind?
I'm not sure that's a good idea.

passing_through.text: Oh, that's too bad. But maybe you could stay a while? You’ve got the hands of a man who knows how to take care of a woman...

suggestion.text: Well, I could use some help... Maybe you could start by giving me a nice backrub... and then, who knows where those strong hands might wander?

back_off.text: Oh, don’t be shy... I won't bite... unless you want me to.

slow.text: Alright, but don’t keep me waiting too long… I’ve been dreaming about those strong arms wrapped around me.

get_closer.text: Mmm... You know just what I need. Let’s make this a moment we’ll both remember forever...

start.text: I can't stop thinking about you... Those strong arms, that rugged look... You're driving me wild.

options.response: Maybe we should get to know each other better.

get_closer_1.text: I was hoping you'd say that... Maybe you could show me just how strong you are...

options.response: Why don't we find somewhere more private?
I'm not sure this is a good idea.

help.text: You're sweet, but I was hoping for something a little more... intimate.

private.text: Mmm... That sounds perfect. Let's go somewhere where we can be alone.

bad_idea.text: Oh... I see. Maybe you're not ready yet.

start.text: I can't wait any longer... I need you, now.

options.response: Let's not waste any more time.
We need to think this through.

no_time.text: Mmm... That's exactly what I wanted to hear. Let's make this night unforgettable.

think_through.text: Maybe you're right... But I can't help how I feel.

start.text: I've never felt this way about anyone... You're the only one for me.

options.response: You're the only one I want, Marge.

final_seduction.text: Mmm... I want to make this last forever. Take this as a token of my love.

start.text: Hey man, wanna help me prank someone?

prank.text: Great! Let's put glue on the teacher's chair!

awesome.text: Haha, you're cool! Meet me at the school later!

start.text: Hey there, you look like someone who needs a little... guidance.

guidance.text: Oh, I could teach you a thing or two... but only if you’re willing to learn.

look_around.text: Don’t get lost... unless you want me to find you.

fast_learner.text: That’s what I like to hear. Let’s start with a private lesson... Just you and me.

options.response: Maybe we should keep this professional.

another_time.text: Suit yourself, but I won’t wait forever... You know where to find me.

ready.text: Mmm, I love a confident man. Let’s see if you can keep up with me...

professional.text: Who said anything about professional? I was thinking we could keep it... personal.

start.text: You came back... I knew you couldn't resist my charms. Are you ready for your next lesson?

options.response: Maybe I should focus on something else.

eager_to_learn.text: Good... Let's see just how quickly you can pick things up.

focus_elsewhere.text: Maybe you're not ready for this yet. Come back when you are.

ready.text: Mmm... I love a man who's ready to dive in.

take_it_slow.text: Slow and steady can be just as fun...

start.text: I've been waiting for you... You must have known how much I wanted to see you again.

options.response: Maybe this is going too far.

couldnt_stay_away.text: Mmm... That's what I wanted to hear. Let's see just how far we can go.

too_far.text: Oh, come on... I know you want this as much as I do.

start.text: I think it's time we took this to the next level, don't you?

final_seduction.text: Mmm... You're just the kind of student I've been waiting for. Take this as a token of my... appreciation.

start.text: Hey, pal. You here for a drink, or are you just here to cause trouble?

drink.text: Good choice. But no funny business, you hear?

passing_through.text: Well, don't let the door hit you on the way out.

start.text: Hey there, handsome. I don't suppose you'd like to keep a lonely woman company?

talk.text: Talk? Why don't we do something more... fun? I could use a strong man like you to keep me warm.

options.response: What do you have in mind?

while.text: I like a man who knows what he wants. How about we take this somewhere private? Just you and me...

mind.text: I've got a few ideas... We could start with a drink, and see where the night takes us...

go.text: Your loss, sweetheart. But I'll be here if you change your mind. I'll be thinking about you...

slow.text: Slow and steady wins the race... but I wouldn't mind speeding things up with someone like you.

lead_way.text: Right this way, darling. Let's make this night unforgettable.

start.text: I knew you'd be back... A woman like me is hard to resist, isn't she?

stay_away.text: Mmm... That's what I like to hear. Let's get comfortable.

passing_through.text: Don't keep me waiting too long, honey. I'm getting impatient...

start.text: I've been thinking about you all day... How about we take this to the next level?

ready.text: Good... Let's make this night one to remember.

slow_down.text: Slowing down isn't my style, but for you... I might make an exception.

start.text: I can't wait any longer... Take me, now.

final_seduction.text: Mmm... You're just what I needed. Take this as a token of our night together.

start.text: Did you know that the average IQ in Springfield is... oh, never mind.

tell_more.text: Well, if you really want to know, I could give you a full lecture...

lecture.text: Great! Let's start with quantum mechanics...

later.text: Alright, but you’re missing out on some amazing knowledge!

start.text: Maggie stares at you with her big, innocent eyes.

walk_away.text: Maggie watches you leave, her eyes still locked on you.

start.text: Well, well... You remind me of a younger, more handsome man... someone who could really make Principal Skinner pay...

miss_him.text: Oh, I do... but I wouldn’t mind finding a new man to put that prissy little mama's boy in his place.

options.response: I'm not looking to settle down.

go.text: Running away? That's too bad... I was just getting interested in showing you what a real woman can do.

flattered.text: Good. Now, how about we discuss this over a nice dinner? I make a mean lasagna... and I know a few other things that might surprise you.

settle_down.text: Who said anything about settling down? I just want a good time with a good man... and you seem like the perfect candidate to make Skinner jealous.

start.text: You remind me so much of that man I used to know... But you're better. Stronger.

prove_it.text: Mmm... I like that confidence. Let's see what you can do.

shouldnt.text: Oh, come on... Live a little. Skinner never needs to know.

start.text: I've been waiting for someone like you... Strong, decisive.

make_it_happen.text: Mmm... That's what I wanted to hear.

slow_down.text: Oh, but where's the fun in that?

start.text: You and me, let's make Skinner jealous.

final_seduction.text: Take this as a token... and let's make him jealous.

start.text: Oh, my... You look like an angel sent from heaven, here to take me to... a very sensual paradise...

help.text: That’s sweet of you... Maybe you could help me with more than just chores? Maybe you could help me ascend to a... higher place...

passing_through.text: That’s a shame... I was hoping you could be my guide to that... higher plane.

need.text: I’ve got a few things in mind... but let’s keep it between us. You seem like a man who could handle... a little divine intervention.

options.response: This might be crossing a line...

not_appropriate.text: Maybe not... but sometimes the most sacred things are... a little naughty.

secrets.text: Good... Because I can think of a few things I’d love to do with you... things that would make even an angel blush.

crossing_line.text: Maybe... but isn’t it fun to break the rules every now and then? Even the divine have their... indulgences.

start.text: You've come back... I was hoping you would. There's something about you... something divine.

explore.text: Mmm... Yes, let's see where this takes us.

going.text: Don't take too long... I'll be here, thinking of you.

start.text: I can't stop thinking about you... It's as if the heavens themselves are pushing us together.

not_fight_it.text: Mmm... Exactly what I was hoping you'd say.

slow_down.text: Slowing down isn't easy when you're in heaven... but for you, I might make an exception.

start.text: I think we're destined for something great, you and I... Shall we?

final_seduction.text: Take this as a token of our divine connection.

start.text: Oh, you’re here... Please, go ahead and talk to Luanne. I’ll just... be in the closet.

sure.text: Yes, yes, go ahead. I... I won’t watch. Much.

not_right.text: No, it’s fine... Really. Luanne likes strong men like you.

start.text: Oh, it’s you. Kirk told me you’d be stopping by... He says you’re just his type.

kirk_ok.text: Oh, don’t worry about Kirk. He’s... well, let’s just say he has his own interests. He likes to watch...

feels_wrong.text: Maybe... but wouldn’t it be fun to bend the rules a little? Kirk likes to watch from the closet...

continue.text: Good... I could use some attention. Kirk has been so... absent lately. Let’s make him pay attention for once.

not_sure.text: You’re hesitating? That’s okay. Just know that I’m here... and so is Kirk... in the closet... whenever you’re ready.

start.text: Back again? I knew you couldn't stay away... You and I have something special.

options.response: I'm just here to check on you.
Let's make the most of it.

check_on_you.text: Oh, don't be shy... Kirk loves to watch. He's right there in the closet.

most_of_it.text: Mmm... That's what I like to hear. Let's make him pay attention for once.

start.text: Kirk's been so absent lately... I need someone like you to fill the void.

here_for_you.text: Good... Let's make this something to remember.

slow_down.text: Slowing down isn't my style, but for you... I might make an exception.

start.text: Kirk's in the closet, watching... Let's give him a show he won't forget.

final_seduction.text: Take this as a token of our time together... And let's not tell Kirk everything.

start.text: Ah, an employee! Or are you here to make a deal with the devil?

options.response: What do you have in mind?

deal.text: Excellent... Sign this contract and all your dreams will come true... or else.

passing_through.text: Hmm, no matter. I’ll be watching you...

start.text: Hey, you’re not here to make fun of me, are you?

no_fun.text: Phew, thanks! I’ve had enough of that from Bart...

maybe_fun.text: Aww, man... You’re just like everyone else!

start.text: Welcome! What can I get for you today?

browse.text: Take your time. But remember, no loitering!

deals.text: Ah, a savvy shopper! Let me show you today’s specials...

start.text: Haw-haw! You here to get your butt kicked?

not_today.text: Yeah, that’s what I thought. Loser.

bring_it.text: Alright! Let’s see what you’ve got!

start.text: Hi, I’m Ralph! My cat's breath smells like cat food.

go.text: Bye! I’m going to eat crayons now.

start.text: Oh my stars... You look just like Mr. Burns in his younger years... strong, commanding... I’ve never been more sure of my feelings...

options.response: It’s just you and me, Smithers.

just_us.text: Well, I suppose... I could use the company. You know, Mr. Burns has always been my guiding star... but you, you’re something else... something I never dared to dream of.

options.response: Maybe this isn’t the right time.

come_back.text: Alright, but don’t keep me waiting too long... It’s rare to find someone who can... fill Mr. Burns' shoes.

company.text: You’re very kind... and rather charming. Perhaps we could... get to know each other better? I’ve always wondered what it would be like to be with someone like you... someone who could command a room just like Mr. Burns.

not_right_time.text: I understand... But know that I’ll be here, thinking about you... and what might have been.

like_that.text: Mmm... I’ve never felt this way before. You’re quite irresistible... It’s like Mr. Burns, but with... something more... something I never thought possible.

slow.text: Slow is good... But I hope you won’t keep me waiting forever. There’s a fire burning inside me that only you can quench.

start.text: You're back... and looking even more like Mr. Burns. But there's something else... something more.

options.response: I think I know what you're feeling.

know_feeling.text: Mmm... Then you know how hard it is to resist. Perhaps we shouldn't...

checking_in.text: Well, don't leave too soon... I might need you.

start.text: I can't stop thinking about you... You're everything I've dreamed of.

feel_same.text: Mmm... Then let's not waste any more time.

slow_down.text: Oh, but where's the fun in that?

start.text: Let's make this happen... Just you and me, forever.

final_seduction.text: Take this as a symbol of our commitment... to each other.
